```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

# Load the data
p = px.line(y=[1, 2, 3])
tips = px.data.tips()
num_col = tips.shape[1]
num_row = tips.shape[0]

b = px.histogram(tips, x='day', y='tip')

```
